channel.title: Homelab on Andrew Houser
channel.description: Recent content in Homelab on Andrew Houser

item.title: Wireguard VPS as Reverse Proxy and Gateway to Home Network
item.description: Network Diagram Requirments Device or VM on home network with Wireguard VPS with public ip, Wireguard, and reverse proxy of choice. (Nginx Proxy Manager is great for most basic uses.) Wireguard Configs NOTE: The Wireguard network and your home network must be on different subnets! Custom routing and masquarading rules will allow you to connect to home network through Wireguard. These rules were adapted from adapted from Multi Hop Wireguard by Justin Ludwig.
